
{{alias}}( value )
    Test if a value is a binary string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating whether value is a binary string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( '1000101' )
    true

    > bool = {{alias}}( 'beep' )
    false

    > bool = {{alias}}( '' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
